name: Pirate Service
description:
Pirate service is a small game made for our school's 2 day game jam. 

In the game you talk to a few npcs and they each give you different task to sail and get them something, in return you will get a hint to a grand treasure.

There are two people who worked on this project:

Me - Coding

Kaspian - 3D assets https://sketchfab.com/Kaspian.Seppanen
